TopicTitle: A new kerbal killer have arrived

Articles.Content:
Just joking, didn't kill any kerbal since 0.20...or did I

Hello, i'm the guy that is not afraid to use his real name as user name i'm from Madagascar and I've been playing KSP since 0.19.

Been reading the forum for 10 month now and finally decided to join.

By.
Hello real Hary R, and welcome to the forum.
You think you're a Kerbal killer. Look at this guy.http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/80465-Genocide-Ship

Welcome aboard, sir! Madagascar, eh?

You wouldn't possibly, ah...

Have seen any...

Escaped zoo animals, would yeh?
